attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Impero is a piece of software often used in school and work envoronments. It infringes our civil liberties by giving others total control over our computers and giving them the possiblilty to read our e-mails. This is not only infringing our liberties, but also infringing the data protection act and showing the user, possibly even a hacker our personal information. I the systems hard drives fell into the wrong hands they would have access to our personal browsing history and other personal inforamtion, resulting in fake credit cards being made in our names!
This includes all impero-like software (monitoring software).

Please sign today to give us back our long lost liberty and right to freedom on the internet!
